title: IS NOT NULL
text:
The IS NOT NULL command is used to test for 
non-empty values (NOT NULL values).
The following SQL lists all customers with a value in the "Address" field:

Example

  SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, AddressFROM CustomersWHERE Address 
  IS NOT NULL;

Try it Yourself »

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, AddressFROM CustomersWHERE Address 
  IS NOT NULL;
